A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Within a few moments of the film starting I felt like I was watching a SNL spoof. The entire movie felt like it was written and directed by someone who \"LOVES\" The Phantom Menace but just could not live up to making it as \"good.\"  Just stop Disney\, this kind of tripe is ruining everything and anything left to love about this story.  TLJ is a shoddy story full of meaningless plot and scenes\, culminating into a epic disappointment. I'd expect better story from a high school creative writing club.
